triggerQueries: How do I modify the number of beneficiaries on my policy?
intents.displayName: How do I modify the number of beneficiaries on my policy?

dialogs.displayName: How do I modify the number of beneficiaries on my policy?

web.content:
- Fill EL request form or submit a letter to add beneficiary to policy, via email/walk-in.
- The client must indicate the name and date of birth of the new beneficiary, as well as the relationship of the beneficiary to the client.


*NB. Officer must explain the implications of this change to the Policyholder. There may be a need for the Policyholder to write out the names of all his/her intended beneficiaries each time this request is made.*
